BAND INFO

QUOTE
Bloodflowerz was a German Gothic Metal/Gothic Rock band. Since signing to Silverdust Records in 2002, they have released 3 full-length albums and 2 EPs.

Bloodflowerz released ?7 Benedictions / 7 Maledictions? to strong reviews everywhere.
